thread.title: 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants
thread.title_full: 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants

title: 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants
text: > South Carolina 13 museums named recipients of art conservation grants This undated photo provided by the Bank of America Art Conservation Project shows Edouard Manet's “Woman in Evening Dress.” The oil painting, which has been on permanent view at New York's Guggenheim since the 1960s, will be restored with a grant by the Bank of America. Thirteen museums in seven countries have been named recipients of the grants, totaling more than $1 million, for the conservation of artworks. (Bank of America Art Conservation Project, courtesy of the Solomon R. Guggenheim Museum, via AP)
